typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Sales_Month as date,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
